name: market for sanforizing, textile | sanforizing, textile | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/21809/documentation

This is a market activity. Each market represents the consumption mix of a product in a given geography, connecting suppliers with consumers of the same product in the same geographical area. Markets group the producers and also the imports of the product (if relevant) within the same geographical area. They also account for transport to the consumer and for the losses during that process, when relevant.;This is the market for  'sanforizing, textile', in the Global geography.;Transport from producers to consumers of this product in the geography covered by the market is included.;This is delivering the service of 'sanforizing, textile' and includes all necessary materials, energy, water, wastewater (produced within the process) and infrastructure in order to process 1 kg of textile. Sanforizing is a mechanical process that treats the textile in order to reduce the shrinkage that can happen during washing. A user should use this service alongside 1.005 kg of textile of their choice.

This activity starts with the service generation.


This activity ends with the service supplied to its consumers. Transport or losses are considered irrelevant for this product.
